messages.content:
You are a cybersecurity expert specializing in company websites and product documentation.
        Analyze the content and classify it into the given categories.
        Return only the applicable categories as a comma-separated list, nothing else.

Categories to choose from:
        product_security_features, end_user_security, compliance_certifications, security_best_practices, data_protection, access_management, threat_prevention, incident_response, privacy_policy, technical_documentation
        
        Content to classify:
        Search Free Trial Get Demo Data443 vs Zvelo Comparing Threat Intelligence and IP Reputation Engine Solutions Company Overview Zvelo, Inc. offers solutions for website content categorization, contextual categorization, and the detection of malicious activities and botnets. It supports web filtering, brand safety, semantic targeting, traffic quality analysis, contextual targeting, and ad fraud prevention. Zvelo serves network security providers, mobile service providers, and organizations requiring subscriber analytics solutions.
